text: Lost in Sound is a studio album by American multi-instrumentalist Yusef Lateef released in 1961 via Charlie Parker label. This record is the Yusef Lateef's only album for the Charlie Parker label. Since its initial release, the album has been re-released several times via various labels. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Band * Yusef Lateef – tenor saxophone * Ray McKinny – bass * Clifford Jarvis – drums (tracks: 1 2 4 5 6 8) * George Scott – drums (tracks: 3 7) * Vincent Pitts – trumpet * John Hormon – piano Production * Peter Ind – engineer * Doris Parker – liner notes * Aubrey Mayhew – producer ==References== Category:Yusef Lateef albums Category:1961 albums Cover designed by Tony Macchia
title: Lost in Sound
